scheme_name: PMMSY: Installation of Cages in Reservoirs Scheme - Haryana
brief_description: The scheme aims to promote cage fish farming. It provides grants per unit to the individuals and groups for sustainable aquaculture practices.
detailed_description: The "Installation of Cages in Reservoirs Scheme" was launched by the Ministry Of Fisheries, Animal Husbandry & Dairying, Government of India, under the umbrella scheme "Pradhan Mantri Matsya Sampada Yojana". It aims to promote sustainable aquaculture practices by supporting cage fish farming in water bodies. Under this scheme, a grant of ₹3,00,000/- per unit to the individuals and groups for setting up cage fish farms, thereby encouraging entrepreneurship, increasing fish production, and generating employment.
benefits: 40% of unit cost for General Category beneficiaries. 60% of unit cost for Scheduled Caste/Women beneficiaries.
Up to 5 cages for individual farmers. Up to 20 cages for registered cooperative societies/self-help groups/joint liability groups (with at least 10 members).
eligibility_criteria: The applicant should be an individual farmer, cooperative society, self-help group, or joint liability group. The cooperative society, self-help group, or joint liability group having a minimum of 10 members. The applicant must possess a Family Identity Card (Parivar Pehchan Patra). The applicant must obtain prior permission from the Government of Haryana and competent authorities. The cage location must have year-round water availability and a minimum of 8 meters depth. The applicant should take government permission for rearing exotic fish species.

documents_required:
General Document:
Family Identity Card (Parivar Pehchan Patra). Agreement 1 (agreement deed between the beneficiary and the fisheries Department). Date of Birth Certificate (Voting Card/Birth Certificate/Aadhar Card/Matriculation Certificate). Caste Certificate (from a first-class Magistrate (Tehsildar)). Training Certificate. Land Record (Land record from Tehsil (own land- Jamabandi, Nakal, Akshizra, Farad) or registered lease deed of minimum 7 years. Bills/Receipts/Vouchers. Photographs of cages with beneficiary. Bank Account Detail. Pan Card.
Detailed Project Report (DPR)/Self-Contained Proposal (SCP) with:
Project justification. Capital and recurring cost details. Source of the beneficiary's contribution. Bank consent for loan (if applicable). Employment potential and project timeline. An undertaking that no other government assistance has been availed for the project.
